EnemyInfo.Name: Spark
EnemyInfo.Description: Electric environmental spark that damages on contact.

Property.Name: Pattern
Property.Description:
The pattern that the spark does. Flashing will alternate on and off based on the delay. It will spend 8 more frames off than specified. Dropping will spawn a falling spark projectile after every delay period.
The falling sparks have a random horizontal speed which can be modified at $86:F3D4. It's a list a 7 pairs of words, the first is pixels/frame, the second is sub-pixels/frame.
If random delay is set, it will choose a random number and mask with 0x003F for the number of frames. This can be modified at $A8:E700. Keep in mind that this is a bit mask, so using a value like 0x00F0 would be between 0 and 240, and is a multiple of 16.

Property.Name: Delay
Property.Description: Delay between changes. Ignored if random delay is set.
